content: The key assumptions included in our 2022 guidance are, in occupancy of 92% to 93%, same-store NOI growth from 3% to 5%, bad debt of 1.5% of revenue, a debt-to-EBITDA RE ratio of 7.8 times to 8.1 times, and a reduction in our annual G&A cost of approximately $2.5 million $3 million and for 2022, including non-recurring stock forfeitures and severance cost, we expect our 2022 G&A to be between $3 million and $3.5 million lower than 2021.
